title: "Startup Island TAIWAN Leads Taiwanese Digital Tech Startups into Ho Chi Minh City"
excerpt: "The Taiwan Tech Solution Day, an initiative by Startup Island TAIWAN targeting the ASEAN market, commenced with Ho Chi Minh City in Vietnam. Representing the Vietnamese government, NIC's officer, Nguyen Thi Ngoc Dung came from Hanoi to introduce the potential of Vietnam's startup development and enthusiastically welcomed Taiwanese startups to explore more business opportunities in Vietnam."
